An incredible clip from 2010 has resurfaced in which Tyson Fury admits he was nearly knocked out by an amateur Anthony Joshua in a north London sparring session.

articles.title: Jake Paul insults Conor McGregor in $50million boxing match challenge - Daily Mail
articles.description: Paul claimed his team had sent McGregor a '$50m offer' to set up an eight-round bout - suggesting the Irishman was 'ducking' the fight because he did 'not want to lose to a f***ing YouTuber'.
